Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet
   Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its Internet homepage Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU" on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
